short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Graying out news, posts and messages you have already seen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you regularly read sites like Reddit or Hacker News, Fresh News can help you focus on new content, graying out posts you have already seen.

Similar to grayed link text for visited sites, except you don't have to click on news headlines.
